title: Electronic Transactions on Numerical Analysis
summary: Electronic Transactions on Numerical Analysis  is a peer-reviewed scientific open access journal  publishing original research in applied mathematics with the focus on numerical analysis and scientific computing.[1] It is published by the Kent State University and the  Johann Radon Institute for Computational and Applied Mathematics (RICAM). Articles for this journal are published in electronic form on the journal's web site.  The journal is one of the oldest scientific open access journals in mathematics.[2]
